KEY FEATURES

– Boost Productivity: Supports security tokens, eliminating the need for verification codes. Organize your logins, quickly search, and access them with one-click in a new tab, window, or even incognito mode.

– Team Collaboration: Import/export credentials effortlessly, copy login details to the clipboard in one click, or generate session login links for quick access.

– Enhanced Security: Your data is encrypted and synced across any Chrome browser where you're logged in (if synchronization is enabled). Passwords and tokens are securely protected, with optional PIN code security for added protection.

WHAT'S NEW

– Omnibox Support: Log in to Salesforce directly from Chrome’s address bar. Just type 's' and a space to search your credentials.

– UI/UX Improvements: Fresh design, improved drag-and-drop, and better keyboard navigation.

– Customizable Tabs: Boost productivity with dynamic, customizable tab icons and titles.

LATEST UPDATES

– UI/UX additional updates for a smoother experience.

– Enhanced security options: Choose between extension lock features like fingerprint or faceprint (depending on your device).

– Performance improvements and bug fixes.
